title: Jennifer Lopez is back in that green dress after 20 years
text:
Jennifer Lopez gave us the best flashback Friday.

The "Hustlers" star strutted down Friday's Versace fashion show in an even more daring version of that iconic green dress — the one she wore to the Grammys about 20 years ago. The same dress that's been pegged the " first viral dress" ever.

Lopez, 50, closed out the show in the green, flowy gown and posed with designer Donatella Versace afterward. Although strikingly similar, the new version of the dress is brighter, sleeveless, and has even less material overall.

Jennifer Lopez and Donatella Versace pose following the presentation of Versace's Women's Spring Summer 2020 collection in Milan on September 20, 2019. MIGUEL MEDINA/AFP/Getty Images

Fans of the multifaceted actress have taken to Twitter in reaction of the show-stopping moment — most of them calling Lopez a "Goddess."
description: The "Hustlers" star brought back the green dress that many point to as the "first viral dress" at the Versace fashion show during Milan Fashion Week.
